pages.text: $(thing)Hauling$() is trained in 3 main ways:$(br)1. Fishing with a standard fishing rod$(br)2. Fishing with a Hauling rod$(br)3. Fishing with a Fishing cage$(br2)Each method has its benefits and drawbacks
pages.title: Training Methods

pages.text: There may also be additional supplementary sources of $(thing)Hauling$() xp, such as hunting down Shiny Squid, and certain abilities or equipment may increase the amount of xp gained from $(thing)Hauling$()-related actions.
Standard fishing rods are the first step to $(thing)Hauling$() training

The standard fishing rod is where you'll begin your $(thing)Hauling$() journey. It works just like it always has; right click to cast out your line into the water, and wait for a bubble trail to nibble onto your lure, then right click to pull in.
Hauling rods are the next step in fishing technology!

Hauling rods can be used once you have unlocked the ability to do so through the $(thing)Hauling$() skill.$(br)These rods work somewhat differently to the standard fishing rod, requiring a bit more attention and effort to properly utilise.$(br2)There may also be other variables that affect how effective your fishing is, such as local environment, temperature, nearby players, etc.

To use a hauling rod, right click to cast out your line, then wait for a fish to become interested. Once a fish is interested, it will approach your lure before latching on and attempting to swim away with it.$(br)Once this happens, right-click as fast as you can to reel it in!$(br)Taking too long to reel in the fish may cause it to escape, and you'll have to start again

Some fish may take more effort to reel in than others, and big fish in particular may require a rod with a bit more pull strength.$(br)Once a fish is hooked, it is recommended to stay in place and reel it in. Approaching the fish may cause it to panic and escape earlier than it otherwise would have.
Fishing cages are for the lazy fisherman in us all

Fishing cages are an alternate, and supplementary fishing method for catching fish, and may be used whilst fishing with a rod.$(br)To use a fishing cage, simply throw it into the water and let it sink to the bottom. Once in place, it will begin to passively capture fish and other items.$(br)Typically, fishing cages are a much slower method of catching fish, and also tend to catch less valuable fish & items
